name: RichardBachQuotes
0:
”Alexa, ask Richard Bach Quotes for inspiration”
”ask Richard Bach Quotes for a quote”
”ask Richard Bach Quotes for something he wrote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: richard bach quotes
des:
"To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there", wrote Richard Bach in the Bridge Across Forever.

I imagined an Alexa skill to provide a random Richard Bach quote.

Discover over one hundred brilliant & mind-expanding quotes from our favorite author.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
